title: 不明原因的崩溃
author: lzh_zmh
txt_content:
使用NullCraft Minecraft Server Pro来管理服务端。
无法开启服务端。
服务端核心为Thermous
游戏版本1.7.10
已确保使用的jre是64位java7
分配内存4096MB到8192MB
服务器崩溃报告如下：
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: joptsimple/OptionSpec
        at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.ServerLaunchWrapper.run(ServerLaunchWrapper.java:25)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.ServerLaunchWrapper.main(ServerLaunchWrapper.java:12)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: joptsimple.OptionSpec
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        ... 4 more

replies.author: lzh_zmh
replies.txt_content:
2019-08-07 20:47:52,247 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-08-07 20:47:52,248 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-08-07 20:47:56,076 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-08-07 20:47:57,837 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
2019-08-07 20:47:57,839 警告 Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
崩溃记录变为如上所示
根据https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... ight=out&page=1的解决方案
尝试安装Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable未果
然而本机已使用过Dx修复工具，装有Microsoft Visual C++2008运行库

replies.author: lzh_zmh
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-7 20:44
库文件放进去了吗

https://github.com/CyberdyneCC/Thermos/issues/136
请问大佬还在？
2008版的微软C++运行库确实已经安装
但是还是会出现Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream的错误，请问这是什么原因呢？

replies.author: lzh_zmh
replies.txt_content:
